Message: The user completes the submission of the form

Hello, I am currently trying to create an Ad Set via an API call with what seems to be valid parameters but get the following message in the error: "There is an issue with the ad platform that we are currently addressing. Please stay tuned for updates, and feel free to reach out to your Account Manager for more information. Thank you!". Are you aware of any current issues or is this a generic error?

Hi Farhad, it sounds like you are encountering a platform issue. This error message indicates that there might be a temporary issue with the ad platform. I recommend reaching out to your Account Manager for more detailed information and updates on this matter. If you need further assistance, you can also contact our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com.
